title: BARC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 23 Doctor Posts
description: Bhabha Atomic Research Centre (BARC) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 23 Doctor jobs. To fill up the vacancies for 23 MBBS, MD/ MS can grab this chance and apply for the BARC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligble candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the off...
